sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over high heat. 2. Add minced garlic and sliced bird's eye chili, cook until fragrant. 3. Add thinly sliced beef sirloin and cook until browned. 4. Stir in thinly sliced bell peppers and cook until slightly softened. 5. Add cooked wide rice noodles to the skillet and toss to combine. 6. In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce, and brown sugar. 7. Pour sauce over the noodles and toss well. 8. Tear Thai basil leaves and add to the skillet. Cook until wilted. 9. Serve hot.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Wide Rice Noodles (200g, cooked), Beef S</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Thai Drunken Noodles</name> <nutrition>Calories: 450, Protein: 25g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 40g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Thinly slice beef sirloin. 2. Mince garlic. 3. Slice bell peppers.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f491d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afec</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
